Register to load from disk¶

In [1]: import pytraj as pt

In [2]: traj = pt.iterload('tz2.nc', tz2.parm7')
   ...: traj
   ...: 
  File "<ipython-input-2-7e730e39651c>", line 1
    traj = pt.iterload('tz2.nc', tz2.parm7')
                                            ^
SyntaxError: EOL while scanning string literal

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
NameError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-3-a7c6efd89c9a> in <module>()
----> 1 traj

NameError: name 'traj' is not defined

Register to load from disk with frame stride¶

# start=0, stop=8, step=2
In [4]: pt.iterload('tz2.nc', tz2.parm7', frame_slice=(0, 8, 2))
  File "<ipython-input-4-4b1693f12f16>", line 1
    pt.iterload('tz2.nc', tz2.parm7', frame_slice=(0, 8, 2))
                                                            ^
SyntaxError: EOL while scanning string literal

Register to load several files from disk¶

In [5]: pt.iterload(['tz2.0.nc', 'tz2.1.nc'], tz2.parm7')
  File "<ipython-input-5-36a9f10b9b45>", line 1
    pt.iterload(['tz2.0.nc', 'tz2.1.nc'], tz2.parm7')
                                                     ^
SyntaxError: EOL while scanning string literal

Register to load several files from disk with frame stride¶

In [6]: pt.iterload(['tz2.0.nc', 'tz2.1.nc'], tz2.parm7', frame_slice=[(0, 8, 2), (0, 5, 1)])
  File "<ipython-input-6-a4a456e24d6f>", line 1
    pt.iterload(['tz2.0.nc', 'tz2.1.nc'], tz2.parm7', frame_slice=[(0, 8, 2), (0, 5, 1)])
                                                                                         ^
SyntaxError: EOL while scanning string literal

␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀---------------------------------------------------------------------------

␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Iterate a part of trajectory¶

  • with stop value
In [12]: for frame in pt.iterframe(traj, stop=5):
   ....:     print(frame)
   ....: 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
NameError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-12-7dfde077be6d> in <module>()
----> 1 for frame in pt.iterframe(traj, stop=5):
      2     print(frame)
      3 

NameError: name 'traj' is not defined
  • with given frame indices
In [13]: for frame in pt.iterframe(traj, frame_indices=[0, 5, 20, 50]):
   ....:     print(frame)
   ....: 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
NameError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-13-b9131f200d16> in <module>()
----> 1 for frame in pt.iterframe(traj, frame_indices=[0, 5, 20, 50]):
      2     print(frame)
      3 

NameError: name 'traj' is not defined
  • with given mask
In [14]: for frame in pt.iterframe(traj, frame_indices=[0, 5, 20, 50], mask='@CA'):
   ....:     print(frame)
   ....: 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
NameError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-14-f16bb852d094> in <module>()
----> 1 for frame in pt.iterframe(traj, frame_indices=[0, 5, 20, 50], mask='@CA'):
      2     print(frame)
      3 

NameError: name 'traj' is not defined

Do computing¶

# rmsd to first frame with mask='@CA'
# python starts counting from 0
In [15]: pt.rmsd(traj, ref=0, mask='@CA')
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
NameError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-15-82b68fc954cb> in <module>()

NameError: name 'traj' is not defined

␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀---------------------------------------------------------------------------
